name: Happy Color Bubble
description:
Happy Color Bubble is an interesting and challenging Ball shooting game. There are lots of new game play added to Happy Color Bubble. Pop, match and blast bubbles

FEATURES
* Hundreds of challenging levels.
* Cool graphics and visual effects.
* Fast-paced exciting gameplay.
* Bubble swap is totally free, just tap on your bubble to change its color.
* Classic and most addicting gameplay, hours of endless fun are guaranteed!
* Plenty of fun brain teasers and puzzles.
